about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the mysterious world of EdgeRunner, a parkour-infused, exploration-based adventure with a touch of horror. Uncover hidden secrets, solve hacking puzzles, and unravel the storyline with multiple endings. Each ending reveals a piece of the story and dynamically changes the narration for subsequent playthroughs!

(Not only narration, but that's for the full version—coming soon!)

name: EdgeRunner Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200/Intel Core i5-7400 @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 ti / AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
